en.title: Location, location, location

en.title: Inspect for an enclosure around the pool and spa area
Inspect the gate(s) around the pool area to establish they are working, have self closing mechanism and latches

Which vessels will you be inspecting?

en.title: Which equipment will you be inspecting?
Is the ${equipmentname} a sufficient size to serve the house and pool heater?
en.helpertext: Take a picture of the meter plate

en.title: Is allapplicable equipment interconnected within the bonding grid?
en.helpertext: NEC Section 680 requires all metal components of the pool equipment to be bonded together

en.title: Select all equipment that is not adequately bonded
en.helpertext: Take a picture of the missing or inadequate bonding connections

en.title: Is all applicable equipment GFCI protected?
Select all the equipment that is not GFCI protected
